1.05.name: wordpress/wordpress-lastfm-plugin
1.05.description:
If you have an LastFM Account, you can insert playlists and tagclouds in your posts very easy. No flash or silvlight. Simply insert [lfm.getTopArtists username] in your post. Available functions are descripted at the plugin option page.

Be carefull PHP 5 is needed!
